name: VG Remove html comment
author: Vishal Gupta

sections.description: VG Remove html comments is very simple and low weight plugin which helps WordPress/dashboard user to remove html comment from website. This MAY have an adverse impact on caching
sections.installation:
• Download the plugin .zip file.
  • Login in to admin Click Plugins -> Add New -> Upload.
  • Find VG Remove html comment in plugin list and activate it.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  • Download the plugin .zip file.
  • Login in to admin Click Plugins -> Add New -> Upload.
  • Find VG Remove html comment in plugin list and activate it.
